content:
Here is a doodle poll https://doodle.com/poll/z9mni35mnzmc4vh3
- I am new to doodle so forgive me if I botched it up - used Lloyd's calendar and mine as a base. Basically M/W/Thurs at 4 look good for both of us and I have other time slots open on Thursday (11 and 1) All Eastern. But next Thursday I can't do 11 or 1 due to teaching FHIR cert course.
One of the proposed times is Sunday. (The good news is I'm clear then. But traditionally we tend to avoid calls on weekends... :) )

This looks not right. Are we selecting only a time for our first call (five are proposed, ignoring the Sunday), or a recurring time?

I think we discussed meeting every two weeks.

In general my schedule is erratic - I usually have no recurring meetings, but when I'm on airplanes to a speaking gig, no amount of persuasion will make me available :slight_smile:
Sunday date/time was a sleepy accident. For a recurring call during east coast work hours, Mon, Tues, or Thurs at 4 work for me, and Thursday at 11 or 1 but not this upcoming Thursday for 11 or 1.
Ok - I created a document with these resources and others on our documents page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PE/Documents

We are still struggling to get the meeting time. Everyone who is already voted please look again - have added/changed some suggestions. Everyone who hasn't voted please vote: https://doodle.com/poll/z9mni35mnzmc4vh3
Is this for the first meeting or recurring slot? (The subject line says "regular time" but if that were the case we shouldn't see e.g. multiple Mondays listed.)

@Mikael Rinnetm채ki @Debi Willis you're each in there twice. Please disambiguate. (It looks like you answered once, leaving 3 pre-existing answers, then Virginia added a lot more options, but you answered again on a separate row.)

Or @Virginia Lorenzi maybe YOU have to delete the duplicates?
@Abigail Watson @Lloyd McKenzie @Virginia Lorenzi you all have vast fields of "?" indicating you ain't clicked nuttin' on most days. Please do.
I hereby complain pretty stiffly about the redundancy or gaps between this thread here and the seemingly similar one in email.
This is getting to be fully annoying and time-wasting. I appreciate the efforts to get something started but let's get our act together and have one process that converges, please. Thanks.

Hi all, I'm going to be traveling to India for the next two weeks, leaving tomorrow. So all of my available times for the next two weeks are 12 hours opposite, and most of these will be 3AM for me. I can do some of the 9/10AM meetings. No guarantees on reception; but if we do the 30th or 4th, I should be in Hyderabad with some amount of internet.
Fixed my entry.
The "?"s indicate that they've selected that option, but the option was modified afterwards.

This was a weird experience setting up a doodle. Looks like our first meeting will be Friday Oct 4th at 10AM Eastern and then a recurring meeting Thursdays at 1PM. This works well for everyone except Lisa :disappointed: Abigail - perhaps when you are back it will work for you. Attached are calendar invites.

HL7-Patient-Empowerment-Kickoff-Call.ics

HL7-Patient-Empowerment-Interim-Group-Weekly-Call.ics
Thanks Virginia. I look forward to the call.
Do standing meetings get posted to a Confluence or something, in HL7?
Thank you indeed for sorting this out!

Having them listed on Confluence is good practice. As soon as they're official, they'll also get listed in HL7's conference call tool which shows a calendar of all calls (and sends out reminders 3 days ahead each week).

This was a weird experience setting up a doodle. Looks like our first meeting will be Friday Oct 4th at 10AM Eastern and then a recurring meeting Thursdays at 1PM. This works well for everyone except Lisa :disappointed: Abigail - perhaps when you are back it will work for you. Attached are calendar invites.

HL7-Patient-Empowerment-Kickoff-Call.ics

HL7-Patient-Empowerment-Interim-Group-Weekly-Call.ics

I will try to make the tail end if you last the full hour.
I have the call up but no one has joined @Lisa Nelson @Mikael Rinnetm채ki @Debi Willis @Dave deBronkart @Lloyd McKenzie @Nancy Lush @Rachel Richesson
Nevermind - its at 1Pm eastern - silly me.
I didn't know it got scheduled....
Yes - see the meeting time earlier on here. And its at 1 so you havent missed it. We have a confluence page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PE/Patient+Empowerment+Home
thanks. I can't make this week due to a last-minute conflict.
I showed it at 1 central time
1 eastern conflicts with OO call.
Minutes posted on confluence: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=66924005
Im sorry it conflicts with OO @John Moehrke :(
